Posts.Content: nicole4life wrote: So I have had some troubling symptoms the past month. I had a mammo and US but noting was found.. Howver, they did refer me to the Breast Specialst in a few weeks. The symptoms that I have is a mild swollne Lymph node right in my chest wall below the collar bone, heavey right side of breast, vein protruding, warmth, Swollen right breast, Localised pain in one area under the breast, Slight dimpling on right side of breast almost by arm pit, clear nbipple discharge, and what i think to be as a very mild case of the orange peel skin ( it just looks like embelized hair foliciles). I have also been have upper back tightness, styrange chest pains and I feel nauseous ALOT! Do any of these sound familiar to you? Should I be overly concerned? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: right breast swollen, oblong nipple, heavy breast pain nicole4life nicole4life
